channel.title: Need a good programer to steal a source from a game!
channel.description: I need someone to make something like moparscape for virtual magic kingdom. I dont know how you get the source, but i need it to make a game like moparscape. I will give the person credit and i need you to be able to spawn up items and stuff like that. the site it www.vmk.com so plz go there and try to get the source and try to improve it.

item.title: Need a good programer to steal a source from a game!
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“Bebemycat2, post:9, topic:38329”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=54067.msg683800#msg683800 date=1167097715]
Editing games and releasing them is illegal.
[/quote]
Illegal is just a term that the government uses to describe the fun they don’t want you to have.[/quote]

perfect sig quote

Read full topic

item.title: Need a good programer to steal a source from a game!
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

learn how to do it yourself I’m not going to get in trouble over helping you and i’m pretty sure no one else will either.

jme_009:

i need someone to make me an mmorpg. it has to be as good as wow. i will give u some creditz!!![br][size=1]Posted at: December 22, 2006, 03:25:18 PM[/size][hr]Get the hint?

lelelelel

Read full topic

item.description:

From the looks of it, it is just a flash game.

Get Sothink flash decompiler, and get to work. I’m sure all the action scripting will be obfuscated though.
